document_data.name: Gaurin
document_data.mainbody: '''Gaurin''' was a [[blightlord]] magic tutor of the [[Nar demonbinder]] [[Jesanta Beril]]'s in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], until she killed him.
document_data.History: Jesanta Beril's uncle found the [[Talontar]] blightlord Gaurin and had him serve as Jesanta's tutor in [[the Art]] on her twelfth birthday. Gaurin taught her magic in the Lady of Poison, [[Talona]]'s ways, rather than [[sorcery]]; as a tutor, he disciplined Jesanta for her interest in binding [[demon]]s over creating [[disease]]s. However, on her eighteenth birthday, Jesanta wandered into her uncle's cabin and found him dead to a Talontar [[poison]]; in response, she slew Gaurin in his sleep.
document_data.Legacy: Jesanta Beril later named her [[imp]] [[familiar]] [[Gaurin (imp)|Gaurin]] after the late blightlord.
